scenario: In 2024, Charlie has wages of $74,416.35. Charlie also has an interest in a passive activity which generated a loss of $33,423.02 for the year. Charlie has passive income from another source of $4,517.43.
question: Calculate the amount of the passive activity loss that is deductible in 2024 under I.R.C. § 469(a).
answer_explanation: Passive losses are limited to passive income. Deductible: $4,517.43.
reasoning: Limited passive loss to passive income.
